prt_smart,1,1,5,21024	sshop	Bonecas	111,22013:150,22016:150,22014:150,22015:150,22017:150,22018:150,22019:150,22020:150,22021:150,22022:150,22023:150,22024:150,22025:150,22026:150,22027:150,22028:150,22029:150,22030:150,22031:150,22032:150,22033:150,22034:150,22035:150,22036:150,22037:150,22038:150,22039:150,22040:150,22041:150,22042:150,22043:150,22044:150,22045:150,22046:150,22047:150,22048:150
prt_smart,131,120,4	script	Itens Por Cupom Evento	732,{
	specialeffect 100;
	mes "[ ^a60536Itens por Cupom Evento^000000 ]";
	mes "Olá, ^FF0000"+ strcharinfo(0) +"^000000!";
	mes "Deseja comprar alguma coisa por Cupom Evento?";
	next;
	switch( select("[^ff0000»^000000] Itens Diversos.","[^ff0000»^000000] Bonecas","[^ff0000»^000000] ROPs","[^ff0000»^000000] Saír.") ){
		case 1: // Tickets, Consumíveis e Caixas
			close2;
			callshop "TccCE",0;
			end;
		case 2: // Tickets, Consumíveis e Caixas
			close2;
			callshop "Bonecas",0;
			end;
		case 3: // Elmos
			close2;
			callshop "ElmosCE",0;
			end;
		case 4:
			close;
			}
}
